CustomField.description: If selected, an error notification is sent to the user when the sObject cloning process fails. The error notification is sent to the system default email address and to any user email assigned.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If selected, an email notification is sent to the user when the sObject cloning process fails. The error notification is sent to the system default email address and to any user email assigned.
CustomField.label: Email When sObject Cloning Fails
